version_description: Bug fixes

- Added ability to disable video ads (see Settings)
- Updated database
- Bug fixes

- Updated station list
- Bug fixes
- Landscape view added
- Reduced amount of ads shown

- Various bug fixes
- Less ads as requested

Fixed compatibility issues with iOS 8
Fixed various bugs

Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
Optimizations made for 64-bit devices
Fixed various minor bugs

Revamped player interface
- You can now choose any image from your photo library as a new skin and it will be set as the background of the player (try it out).
- Landscape mode now takes advantage of the entire width of the device
- Tapping the various GUI elements (such as the clock and speaker image) will hide and unhide them
- Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- iPad users on iOS 8 can choose skins now (bug fix)
- Updated station database

The "Extra Feeds" link in the main menu should now correctly direct you to all the extra feeds not found in the non-Pro version of 5-0 Radio. We fixed a bug where extra feeds and extra features weren't being shown after upgrading to 5-0 Radio Pro.
New feeds added

- New feeds added
- Various bug fixes
The app now works again with older devices

- Support for iPhone X screens
- Added listener and bitrate count to each listed station when browsing stations.
- Added ability to edit Favorites. Just tap Edit on the top-right of the main menu and then tap on the favorite you want to edit to do so.
- Fixed various bugs

- New stations added on almost a daily basis
- Updated the graphics for iPhone XS and XR users
- Fixed various bugs
The app now works again with older devices

- New feeds added
- Various bug fixes

New “Feeds with Active Alerts” feature that shows you feeds with interesting on-going activity happening right now along with a description of the alert and feed. Various bug fixes and app improvements.
New “Feeds with Active Alerts” feature that shows you feeds with interesting on-going activity happening right now along with a description of the alert and feed. Minor bug fixes in version 42.1.

The "Extra Feeds" link in the main menu should now correctly direct you to all the extra feeds not found in the non-Pro version of 5-0 Radio. We fixed a bug where extra feeds and extra features weren't being shown after upgrading to 5-0 Radio Pro.
New feeds added

- Fixed non-scanner radio feeds
- Dark Mode is now available
- App is now better at restarting the feed when disconnected. The audio will restart if you're on the player screen (the one with the play button) when disconnected. It will still work even if the app is placed in the background. If you're on another screen, such as a menu, the audio will not restart if you're disconnected for a long period of time. This should fix the issue where the feeds disconnect after a few minutes when on the cellular network.
Added new New York City Mutual Aid Response feed to listen to the live audio stream of first responders in NYC dealing with the current pandemic. Made the tabbed buttons more visible.
Fixed a bug where the app might stop playing after a while
Updated feed list. Updated a few graphics.
You can now auto-open to a certain page or feed when you open the app. Choose which page/feed you want to open in the Settings page.
iOS 14 updates. Check out the new backgrounds page in the Extra Feeds section to add a new background to your app to change it up.
Fixed a bug where the background image chosen sometimes did not save or was in the wrong orientation. Also added measures to reduce echoing.
Fixed a bug that caused the app to not work properly on an older iOS
